name: Mister Burnhouse
detailed_description:
Crazy Games!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/838390/Merry_Glade/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/981960/Horror_Girl_Puzzle/


About the Game

A series of mysterious contract killings took place in the city of N. Someone sets the local mafia groups on each other. Fear swallows the city.
The case is taken by Detective Deer. He intends to find the killer and take him to jail!
Dear player, I have to warn you that you are one of the suspects...

Already available in the game:
  • the first Chapter - "Medium Rare"
The Chapter consists of several puzzles and scenes. Traditional quest with elements of point-and-click.
